title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 814.3 - Building codes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 814.3 - Building codes

State Regulations
(a) All programs
and facilities shall adhere to applicable building codes as appropriate. OASAS
may refer any suspected violation to an authority with appropriate
jurisdiction. Applicable building codes include, but are not limited to: (1)

Title 19 NYCRR, Chapter XXXIII, subchapter A, comprising the State Uniform Fire Prevention and Building Code
(Building Code of New York State); (2)

Title 10 NYCRR Subpart
14-1, comprising
the New York State Sanitary Code regarding food service establishments; and
(3)

New York City

Administrative Code, Title 27, Chapter I comprising the Building Code of the

City of New York which shall apply exclusively for all facilities located in
any of the five boroughs of the City of New York; and
(4)
the Building Code of New York State
applicable in all municipalities of the state outside of the five boroughs of
the City of New York; (5)
any and
all applicable local and state occupancy, use, building and zoning
laws. (b) If there is a
conflict between the applicable codes, rules, or regulations, then the most
restrictive standard shall apply under the authority having appropriate
jurisdiction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
814.3

Amended

New

York State Register July 27, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 30, eff. 7/27/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
